p: Several known serine protease inhibitors, among them AEBSF (4-(2-aminoethyl)-benzene sulfonylfluoride) and p-aminobenzamidine (Fig. 11.4) as well as inhibitors of furin or furin-related PCs like Dec-RVKR-CMK, were tested against SKI-1/S1P. A significant inhibition was only found for DCI (3,4-dichloroisocoumarin, compound 58, Fig. 11.21), which exhibited a slow irreversible binding mode with an apparent inhibition constant of 6.8 Î¼M (Bodvard et al. 2007).
